greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: First occurrence of exactly n 0's in the binary expansion of sqrt(2).
comment: Next term after 76570753 is >200000000. - _Ryan Propper_, May 09 2006
example: The binary expansion of sqrt(2) is 1.0110101000001..(A004539) and at position 9, there are five 0's, framed by 1's, so a(5)=9.
results.author: _Ralf Stephan_, May 18 2003
